subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Frank%27sBoxes/Shortwave%20Expereiments/Test%20on%20January%2010th%2C%202008/2-YouCouldComeNow-Can%27tStopIt--Purple--PriceOfMoon.mp3
